name: market for concrete block | concrete block | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/21974/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This market represents the concrete block for construction in Brazil. In this market, expert judgement was used to develop product specific transport distance estimations.;EURO 3 emission standard (equivalent to PROCONVE 5) was chosen because it represents the majority of the Brazilian road cargo fleet, according to the inventory of road transport vehicles in 2013.;Ministry of Environment. 1st National Inventory of atmospheric emissions of road transport vehicles. 2013 http://www.anp.gov.br/wwwanp/images/Emissoes-Atmosfericas-1Inventariodeemissoes.pdf

From the concrete block factory.

Includes the transportation of concrete blocks to the point of delivery, which can be construction material shops or construction sites.
category: C:Manufacturing/23:Manufacture of other non-metallic mineral products/239:Manufacture of non-metallic mineral products n.e.c./2395:Manufacture of articles of concrete, cement and plaster

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Due to the low price, high weight, and consumers distribution concrete block is not traded globally.
